mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rochon, Alexis, 1741-1817
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Is member of Institute of France and of committee of arts and manufactures; congratulates him; sends copy of his Voyages; remembers that Jefferson proposed to go with him to U.S. to establish a monetary system; has offered to L'Escalier a manuscript on that subject; would like to have it printed.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1812 August 7, Paris, [France] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
